fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to Charm at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A player who is charmed cannot harm you in anyway. (Votes against you do not count, Attacks against you will fail, etc.)
- You may only charm one person at a time.
- Charm wears off if the player is attacked by an Adventurer.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Adventurers.
